languages.text: "{name}, не будь наив{mf|ен|на}. Теодора держала при себе ручную несанкционированную ведьму. Ты правда считаешь, что она побрезговала бы перешагнуть черту дозволенного еще раз?"
"{name}, don't be naive. Theodora kept an unsanctioned witch by her side like a pet. Do you really believe she would think twice about crossing the line in other ways?"
languages.original_text: "{name}, не будь наив{mf|ен|на}. Теодора держала при себе ручную несанкционированную ведьму. Ты правда считаешь, что она побрезговала бы перешагнуть черту дозволенного еще раз?"

traits.locale_text: "{name}, don't be naive. Theodora kept an unsanctioned witch by her side like a pet. Do you really believe she would think twice about crossing the line in other ways?"
"{name}, don't be naive. Theodora kept an unsanctioned witch by her side like a pet. Do you really believe she would think twice about crossing the line in other ways?"
"{name}, don't be naive. Theodora kept an unsanctioned witch by her side like a pet. Do you really believe she would think twice about crossing the line in other ways?"
"{name}, don't be naive. Theodora kept an unsanctioned witch by her side like a pet. Do you really believe she would think twice about crossing the line in other ways?"

languages.text: “别这么天真，{name}。西奥多拉把未经帝国批准的女巫像宠物一样带在身边，你真的觉得她做事会三思而后行吗？”
languages.original_text: "{name}, don't be naive. Theodora kept an unsanctioned witch by her side like a pet. Do you really believe she would think twice about crossing the line in other ways?"

traits.locale_text: “别这么天真，{name}。西奥多拉把未经帝国批准的女巫像宠物一样带在身边，你真的觉得她做事会三思而后行吗？”

languages.text: « Ne soyez pas si {mf|naïf|naïve}, {name}. Théodora gardait à ses côtés une sorcière qui, bien que domestiquée, n'était pas assermentée. Croyez-vous vraiment qu'elle aurait hésité une seconde à violer d'autres interdits ? »
languages.original_text: "{name}, don't be naive. Theodora kept an unsanctioned witch by her side like a pet. Do you really believe she would think twice about crossing the line in other ways?"

traits.locale_text: « Ne soyez pas si {mf|naïf|naïve}, {name}. Théodora gardait à ses côtés une sorcière qui, bien que domestiquée, n'était pas assermentée. Croyez-vous vraiment qu'elle aurait hésité une seconde à violer d'autres interdits ? »

languages.text: «{name}, no sea ingenu{mf|o|a}. Theodora tenía una bruja no autorizada a su lado como si fuera una mascota. ¿Acaso espera que no se pasara de la raya en más ocasiones?».
languages.original_text: "{name}, don't be naive. Theodora kept an unsanctioned witch by her side like a pet. Do you really believe she would think twice about crossing the line in other ways?"

traits.locale_text: «{name}, no sea ingenu{mf|o|a}. Theodora tenía una bruja no autorizada a su lado como si fuera una mascota. ¿Acaso espera que no se pasara de la raya en más ocasiones?».

languages.text: 「{name}、甘い考えは捨ててください。シオドーラ様は非公認の魔女をまるでペットのようにそばに置いていました。彼女が他の方法で一線を越えることをためらうと思いますか？」
languages.original_text: "{name}, don't be naive. Theodora kept an unsanctioned witch by her side like a pet. Do you really believe she would think twice about crossing the line in other ways?"

traits.locale_text: 「{name}、甘ったれるな。シオドーラはまるでペットのように、非公認の魔女をそばに置いていた。彼女が他の方法を取ろうなんて、考え直すと思うか？」
「{name}、甘い考えは捨ててください。シオドーラ様は非公認の魔女をまるでペットのようにそばに置いていました。彼女が他の方法で一線を越えることをためらうと思いますか？」

languages.text: "Seid nicht naiv, {name}. Theodora hat eine unsanktionierte Hexe an ihrer Seite gehalten wie ein Haustier. Glaubt Ihr wirklich, sie würde zögern, die Grenze auch auf andere Weise zu überschreiten?"
languages.original_text: "{name}, don't be naive. Theodora kept an unsanctioned witch by her side like a pet. Do you really believe she would think twice about crossing the line in other ways?"

traits.locale_text: "Seid nicht naiv, {name}. Theodora hat eine unsanktionierte Hexe an ihrer Seite gehalten wie ein Haustier. Glaubt Ihr wirklich, sie würde zögern, die Grenze auch auf andere Weise zu überschreiten?"

languages.text: "{name}, saf olma. Theodora, onaysız bir cadıyı evcil hayvan misali yanında tuttu. Sence birtakım çizgileri aşmadan evvel iki kez düşünmeye meyilli birisi miydi?"
languages.original_text: "{name}, don't be naive. Theodora kept an unsanctioned witch by her side like a pet. Do you really believe she would think twice about crossing the line in other ways?"
